Title: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
Writer: Tom McLoughlin, Victor Miller, Sean S. Cunningham
Actors: Thom Mathews, Jennifer Cooke, David Kagen
Plot: Tommy Jarvis exhumes Jason Voorhees to cremate his corpse, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can stop him.
